column2: (verb) to change, or to change something, to suit different conditions or uses
(adj) including many different types of people or things
(verb) to develop gradually, or to cause something or someone to develop gradually
(noun) a typical quality or an important part of something
(noun) all the people of about the same age within a society or within a particular family
(adj) existing as natural or basic part of something
(noun) movement form one region to another and often back again, esp. According to the season of the year
(noun) a series of actions that you take in order to achieve a result
(verb) to continue to live or exist, especially after coming close to dying or being destroyed or after being in a difficult or threatening situation
